name: Penguin Evil
text:
1 "Penguin" Fusion or Synchro Tuner + 1 non-Tuner monster
If this card is Synchro Summoned: Target 2 cards in your GY; banish them, then Special Summon 1 "Penguin" monster from your Extra Deck whose level equals the total levels of the banished monsters. (Quick Effect) You can banish 1 "Penguin" monster from your hand or GY; return 1  card your opponent controls to the hand, and if you do, this card gains 500 ATK. You can only use each effect of "Penguin Evil" once per turn.
